sense.def: Alternative Names yu re 餘熱 , residual heat; yi re 遺熱 , left-over heat. Pathological Condition of a re bing 熱病 , heat disease, brought about by shang han 傷寒 , 傷寒 , harm caused by cold, where the evil heat stays on in the organism despite treatment. Also, of repeated fever brought about by exhaustion or food. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry yan lü 庵 䕡：主五藏瘀血，腹中水氣，臚脹留熱 , “It controls stagnant blood in the five depots, water qi in the abdomen, as well as distension and abiding heat ”.
